item.title: Sebastian Vettel passes Jackie Stewart, wins Bahrain Grand Prix
item.description: It was Vettel's second win in four races this year and 28th of his career.

item.title: IPL 2013: Kings XI Punjab elect to bowl against Pune Warriors
item.description: Kings XI have left out Dimitri Mascarenhas and Paul Valthaty for David Miller and Parvinder Awana.

item.title: Be solid in mind: Viv Richards to Delhi Daredevils
item.description: Delhi had a piece of advice from the team's new ambassador-cum-advisor Viv Richards.

item.title: Hope Viru carries fire in his belly in all games: Mahela Jayawardene
item.description: Just like any pro, Viru takes a lot of pride in performing for Delhi Daredevils.: Mahela

item.title: We have to improve our away record: Rahul Dravid
item.description: Rahul Dravid said Rajasthan Royals hasn't played its best cricket yet.

item.title: Sachin Tendulkar is India's Don Bradman, says Matthew Hayden
item.description: Tendulkar is India's Don Bradman and a movement in himself, says Matthew Hayden.

item.title: Chennai Super Kings hold slight edge over Rajasthan Royals
item.description: Chennai would look to maintain their winning streak when they take on Rajasthan tomorrow.

item.title: I will try to get more wickets for my team, says Vinay Kumar
item.description: Getting the purple cap in the ongoing IPL 2013 has increased Vinay's hunger for wickets.

item.title: Pujara, Ashwin only Indian cricketers in ICC Test rankings
item.description: Pujara and Ashwin were the only two Indian cricketers to figure in the ICC's latest Test rankings.

item.title: Rafael Nadal, Novak Djokovic seal third final in Monte Carlo
item.description: Nadal will lock horns with Djokovic for third time in the Monte Carlo Masters final.
